name: FootRock
description: Legends Don't Die.Help Rocky to finish first.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit) Processor: AMD Athlon 64 3200+ / Intel Pentium 4 3200+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100 or compatible Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Sound Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3850 / NVIDIA GeForce 6800 GT Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Sound Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher

reviews.review_text: Strangest level design of a football training ever. 75 easy acheivements = 85 % for achievement hunter (could have more EASY achievements). Thx 4 reading.
This Game is Insanely Fun Games And This Game is Awesome
Whenever you want to have a little bit of fun, hop on this game and play yourself a few levels amongst the 150 it has to offer, so much content for a lot of fun!
